sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './App.css'; import { Pokemon } from './model/Pokemon'; import axios from 'axios'; function App() { const [pokemonId,setPokemonId]=useState("") const [pokemon,setPokemon]=useState() function changePokemonId(id:string){ setPokemonId(pokemonId+id) } function searchPokemonById(){ console.log("Buscando pokemon con id: "+pokemonId); axios.get("https://pokeapi.co/api/v2/pokemon/"+pokemonId).then((response:any)=>{ setPokemon(response.data) }); } return (

- - - - POKEDEX RETRO - - - -

Nombre: {pokemon?.name}

ID Pokemon: {pokemon?.id}

Altura:{pokemon?.height}

Peso:{pokemon?.weight}

Experiencia Base:{pokemon?.base_experience} pts

Vida:{pokemon?.stats[0].base_stat} pts

Ataque:{pokemon?.stats[0].base_stat} pts

Defense:{pokemon?.stats[0].base_stat} pts

Ataque SP:{pokemon?.stats[0].base_stat} pts

Defensa SP:{pokemon?.stats[0].base_stat} pts

Velocidad:{pokemon?.stats[0].base_stat} pts

Pokemon Id: {pokemonId}

Instrucciones Importantes

*Esta Pokedex abarca hasta 1017 pokemones, eso quiere decir que numeros apartir del 1018 no funcionaran. Si se ingresa un numero mayor o igual que 1018 favor de recargar la pagina.*

); } export default App;
